Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi there, could you please approve my roofing ad, I had to change the URL for better CTRs

Hi Mark, I can't directly approve ads, but I can guide you on what to do next. If your ad was previously rejected and you've made the necessary changes, you should resubmit it for review. Make sure to save your changes and submit the ad again. If you need further assistance or believe there was a misunderstanding, you can email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. For more details, check out this article: [My ad got rejected - What's next](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
